content.question: The architect Augustus W. N. Pugin advocated the use of Gothic elements in the Palace of Westminster (Houses of Parliament) because he believed the Gothic elements would

choices.label: stylistically mirror the nearby Saint Paulâ€™s Cathedral
promote Christian values associated with the style
please Queen Victoria, who favored Gothic ornamentation
create symmetrical ornamentation that could mask an irregular plan

content.answer: promote Christian values associated with the style

topic.text: 4.1: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 4.D: Explain the meaning or significance of continuity and/or change between works of art (or groups of related works of art) within a related artistic tradition, style, or practice.
